article.bdy:
Walgreens Health Services (WHS) is a business unit of
Walgreens . The unit was started in 1991 when Walgreens decided to expand on the services provided by its mail service division. The primary subunits of WHS are:
Walgreens Health Initiatives (WHI), a Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) provider
Walgreens Home Care, which provides home delivery of respiratory therapy, infusion therapy, and home medical equipment
Walgreens Specialty Pharmacy
Walgreens Mail Service, which provides oral, injectable, and infused specialty medications for specialty categories
Walgreens Mail Service which provides mail order pharmacy services for maintenance medications
Walgreens On-Site Pharmacy
